title: Timeless Emerald & Ruby Long Haaram: A Legacy of Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold plated with high-quality zircon stones

inlaid with vibrant rubies and emeralds. Accented with delicate faux pearls. Features a durable alloy base for lasting wear. High quality Cubic Zirconia that has been set in an open setting allows light to pass through it and give it a naturally enhanced shimmer and brilliance.
features: This stunning Haaram features a layered design with floral motifs meticulously set with Zircon stones. The centerpiece is an elaborately designed pendant showcasing emeralds and a traditional South Indian shape. Delicate faux pearls are suspended adding a touch of classic charm. The combination of ruby, emerald, and zircon creates a visually appealing and culturally significant piece, reminiscent of Temple Jewelry's intricate designs.
colors: Predominantly gold (plated) with pops of vibrant green (emerald)
and white (zircon). The addition of faux pearls lends a subtle cream hue
creating a classic and regal color palette.
occasions: or any festive occasion. Its timeless design makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies (like Pellikuturu shringar) and modern celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a fusion of tradition and modernity. The meticulous craftsmanship, high-quality gemstones, and classic design make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its intricate details and vibrant colors will make you the center of attention, exuding elegance and grace. The gold plated finish ensures affordability without compromising on the luxurious look and feel of solid gold. Each piece is made with Cubic Zirconia and Gold finish, giving it a naturally enhanced brilliance. The open setting further allows light to pass through the stones, enhancing the shimmer and brilliance. It's a statement piece that reflects your appreciation for South Indian culture and heritage.
